alert.note: Alert for Upper Rio Grande Valley, Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 16 at 3:54AM MDT until March 17 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches with the heaviest snow occuring across the east facing slopes of the eastern San Juans this afternoon and evening. * WHERE...Upper Rio Grande Valley and Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Feet. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Upper Rio Grande Valley, Eastern San Juan Mountains Below 10000 Ft
